ShortDescription.Value: This mod aims to add features and improve existing ones for the game's landscaping tool.

Publish.LongDescription:
# ExtraLandscapingTools This mod aims to add features and improve existing ones for the game's landscaping tool.
### -> [Full Changelog](https://github.com/AlphaGaming7780/ExtraLandscapingTools/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
## Features ### Brushes parameter You can now change the brush and rotate it. ### Ore, Oil, Underground water and fertile land tools You can now add resources to your map using this tool. ### Custom brush the support is done, there is just no wiki. if you want to know ping me on discord @triton_supreme. (See the [wiki](https://github.com/AlphaGaming7780/ExtraLandscapingTools/wiki).)
## Feature roadmap * ✔️ Custom brush * ✔️ Brush angle * ✔️ Ore, Oil, Underground water and fertile land tools * ✔️ Brushes parameter
# Acknowledgment * **CityRat** Thank you for your help and this thumbnail. * **optimus-code** Thanks for your knowledge and you help on various stuff in this mod. * **Yenyang** Thank you for all your help and knowledge on various game aspect AND PDX mods. * **T.D.W.** Thanks you for all the help with PDX mods. * **Kylte** Thank you for the fix for the Focus bug and its vanilla component resolver that help me lot to understand and make UI.
# Community Looking to discuss Cities: Skylines 2 Unofficial modding together with other modders? You're welcome to join or the [Cities: Skylines Modding Discord](https://discord.gg/27CVdGFA47).
Publish.ChangeLog: # v1.1.0 * Fixed the bug related to ExtendedUI, thanks to Klyte and Yenyang. * Update ExtraLibUI * Update for ExtraLib for 1.1.0
